quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder. – Rumi
fact: This common everyday occurrence composed of 59% nitrogen, 21% hydrogen, and 9% dioxide is called a `fart`.

joke: A beekeeper was indicted after he confessed to years of stealing at work. They charged him with emBEEzlement
